channel.title: Enable the devloper console?
channel.description:
Apologies if this has been asked a zillion times, but search wasn't helpful or I used wrong terms.....
How do you [b]enable[/b] the developer console?
I only have the SDK and mod installed, don't have HL or HL2 installed.

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: coh1985
item.description:
Crypt:

SHIFT + #? What kind of keyboard do you have?

You should just be pressing the key to the left of 1 in your keypad. Also, if you open the game and go to your Keyboard options, you can assign a custom key to open the console.

Thanks Crypt.

On my keyboard that is the ‘`’, ‘¬’, and ‘¦’ key!

Thanks again,
coh1985

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
SHIFT + #? What kind of keyboard do you have?

You should just be pressing the key to the left of 1 in your keypad. Also, if you open the game and go to your Keyboard options, you can assign a custom key to open the console.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: coh1985
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

run black mesa

go to options->keyboard->advanced and tick “Enable developer console”

then press ~

alternatively, I could tell you the console command to enable the console (teehee)

I did the above, but pressing ~ (SHIFT + #) doesn’t open the console.

Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: uncle_revie
item.description:
Jokerine:

Alternatively, left click the mod, click Properties, and add “-console” to the launch options.

Better yet add -dev -console then you will see everything!

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
It was “give weapon_gauss” in HL1 if I recall correctly, not sure if it will work in BM.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: Thugdraft
item.description:
So for some reason, when I entered “Surface Tension” I lost the Tau Cannon. Anybody know what the console command is to get it back?

I’m guessing its “give weapon_???”. “give weapon_taucannon” didn’t work.

EDIT: Never mind - I figured it out. It’s “give weapon_tau”.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
You can also change the key used for developer console in the Keyboard settings. Useful for us without a US layout keyboard (lacking the ` key).

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: TheSidewinder
item.description:
Oh man, that rang a VERY old bell. Thanks again.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
You need to write sv_cheats 1 to enable cheats and sv_cheats 0 to disable them. If you want more console codes, here. Google is your friend.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: TheSidewinder
item.description:
OK, that worked, thanks. Now I can open the console.

But… why doesn’t god mode work? I typed:

god

in dev console as the help text said. Didn’t help, lol. Died by a head-crab after Eli let me out of that room.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
I use it without enabling it, I think. Well, no matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable the devloper console?
item.dc:creator: GordonFreedman
item.description:
Jokerine:

Alternatively, left click the mod, click Properties, and add “-console” to the launch options.

Does not work without also enabling it in-game.

Read full topic
